short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that makes websites you visit respond to sound from your microphone.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Warbler is an audio artwork for the web. This extension uses the browser's microphone input to alter the layout of websites you visit. Making them audio-reactive.
